des: "This recipe is very easy to memorize and it makes great use of peanut butter! You may need to use a candy thermometer for this recipe."
ins: In a large saucepan, bring the corn syrup to a boil over medium heat. using a candy thermometer, cook the syrup to the soft crack stage (270 degrees F/132 degrees C). When this stage is reached, stir in the peanut butter and toasted oat cereal. Quickly drop by heaping spoonfuls onto waxed paper or press into a 9x9 inch square pan lined with waxed paper. Let sit until cool.
